Sandwave roadmap

Stay up to date with the latest Sandwave roadmap. Items in the 'Now' status are currently worked on, items in the 'Next' status will be picked up in the next 1 or 2 sprints and for items in the 'Later' status it is our intention to pick them up in the coming 1 to 3 months.

Information about all of our latest releases can be found here.

Now

Frontend

Frontend redesign

Making the redesigned (Updated and streamlined) frontend releasable.

Next

Partner

Partner program

Also known as the affiliate program.

Data-validation

VIES VAT API

Integration with the API as provided by European Commission, to be able to check the validity of European VAT numbers.

Data-validation

MOSS API

Integration with the MOSS API as provided by the European Commission, to set VAT percentage based on country of origin.

Later

Domain Contact Handle Management

Improved VPS implementation

DNS template management

Installing Wordpress

Sitebuilder integration

Product coupling

Contact

Feature-request
